name: Barbarian Civilization
description:
is my 4th self-sponsored project. It was started since March 2021. Currently I'm running a elite prototype test for design and play-ability with limited outsource budget.

It is a multiplayer turn-based online strategy game. Players promoted themselves to General or Mayor to command troops and cities, attack enemy to win glory of their own parties.

Feedback, opinions, or comments are welcomed by post comment, private message, or a survey form in the game.

If anyone wants to try by other platforms (iOS and Android) , please check our Facebook post: https://www.facebook.com/BarbarianCivilization/posts/120695706912636

Tutorial video: https://www.facebook.com/BarbarianCivilization/posts/124847699830770


---

[Working In Progress] 

Barbarian Civilization is a multiplayer turn-based online strategy game. Players command their troops and cities, defend under fog of war to win glory of their own parties.

This project is expected on mobile platforms. So far it is released on browser for play-ability test.
